name: Consino
description:
GAMEPLAY

After losing another round at the Consino, you've just about had it - you're getting those chips no matter WHAT!

In this quick beat-em-up game, use a deck of cards for performing special attacks on other casino players. Get as many chips as you can out of them! You can use those chips to buy special cards - once you have enough chips, you win.

Careful though! When you get hit you'll lose chips. If you run out of chips and can't afford any more cards, it's game over.

CONTROLS

WASD - Move Around

J - Punch/Select Menu Option

K - Use Next Card

E - Purchase Menu

ASDF (with purchase menu) - Buy Card

Back ground Music

Follow us on twitter  <3

Chirpy - https://twitter.com/ChirpyDerpz
Quevim - https://twitter.com/QuevimDev

No Rnd were harmed in the making of this game
